summary.en: Antproof means designed to keep ants out or prevent ant problems.
summary.zh: antproof 指“防蚂蚁的”，用于阻止蚂蚁进入或造成困扰。

definition.en: Designed or treated so ants cannot get in or cause damage; resistant to ants.
definition.zh: 防蚂蚁的；能阻止蚂蚁进入或造成破坏的。

examples.en: Store sugar in an antproof container.
examples.zh: 把糖存放在防蚂蚁的容器里。

examples.en: They sealed the pantry to make it more antproof during summer.
examples.zh: 他们把食品储藏室密封起来，让它在夏天更防蚂蚁。

examples.en: An antproof trash bin helps keep the kitchen clean.
examples.zh: 防蚂蚁的垃圾桶有助于保持厨房清洁。

extraExplanation: “antproof”是由“ant（蚂蚁）+ -proof（防……的）”构成的复合词。类似结构还有：waterproof（防水的）、childproof（防儿童误开的）、leak-proof（防漏的）。在日常英语中更常见的说法也可以是“ant-resistant（抗蚂蚁的）”或“sealed tightly（密封很严）”。
